entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
